name: The Cult of Kinifell
description:
Gameplay

Fresh on the job as a guide for the local park by the city, you are sent to investigate mysterious disappearances by Kinifell Cave. What you find are a cult of people who do not look human. After generations of somehow living in isolation, they have acquired a taste for any food they can come across, including you.

You must escape these cultists' cave. Fortunately, your only item, a flashlight, is their biggest weakness. From not seeing the sun ever, they possess a hypersensitivity to light, burning them to a crisp instantly. Use it!

They can't see you, but they can definitely hear. Get too close or step on anything that makes noise, they will hear. Be stealthy to get past them without alerting or haul ass, burning them with your flashlight along the way.

Good Luck!

Controls

WASD - Movement. Navigate your way around the cave.

Shift - Sprint, but they will hear you.

Ctrl - Stealth walk to help get past the cultists.

Mouse - To point the flashlight that burns the cultists.

E - Pickup rocks and maps laying around that can help you.

Q - Throw rocks to attract nearby cultists.

Esc - To give up.

Arrow Keys - Navigate menus.

F - Fullscreen

Credits

Garrett Switzer - Programmer, Designer, Sound and Music, Cool Guy

Albert Mancias - Artist, Designer, Narrative, List Guy

Engine and Assets

Gamemaker Studio 2

Lighting System 2D by Jobo
